Positions classified into certain occupational series require approval for special retirement coverage (SRC) purposes under title 5 U.S. Code ยง 8336(c), ยง 8412(d), or ยง 8412(e). Note: Approved PDs can predate the Fully Automated System for Classification (FASCLASS), therefore PDs identified in this tool may or may not be available in FASCLASS.
